title.rendered: Rocker Steiner: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Rocker Steiner
    • Early Career
    • Professional Career
  • Rocker Steiner’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
    • Endorsements
  • Personal Details
    • Girlfriend
    • How Old is Rocker Steiner?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • Career Highlights
    • FAQs About Rocker Steiner

Rocker Steiner is a professional bareback rodeo rider who comes from a family with a long history in rodeo. His grandfather, Bobby Steiner, was a world champion bull rider, and his father, Sid Steiner, won the Steer Wrestling World Champion title in 2002.

Here you can follow Rocker Steiner’s net worth, career earnings, biography, career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Rocker Steiner

Rocker Steiner was born on December 18, 2003, in Texas. He hails from a family with deep roots in rodeo. His grandfather, Bobby Steiner, is a world champion bull rider, and his father, Sid Steiner, won the Steer Wrestling World Champion title in 2002.

Growing up in this environment, it was perhaps inevitable that Rocker would develop a passion for the sport.

Early Career

Steiner’s early career was marked by a love for wakeboarding. At just three years old, he got on his first wakeboard, and by the age of eight, he had performed his first flip.

However, his grandfather suggested that he try out a bucking horse when he was around nine years old, and this marked the beginning of his journey into rodeo.

Professional Career

Rocker Steiner joined the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) in 2022. In the same year, he made history by scoring 95 points on the legendary Virgil of C5 Rodeo at the Riggin’ Rally in Darby, Montana, marking the highest bareback riding score ever recorded. This achievement came just five months into his professional career.

Steiner’s success continued as he was named the 2022 Resistol Bareback Riding Rookie of the Year. He also qualified for the Wrangler National Finals Rodeo twice.

His earnings in the 2023 regular season amounted to $143,123, and he started the 2023 National Finals Rodeo in 7th place.

Rocker Steiner’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Rocker Steiner’s net worth is estimated to be around $2 million.

His earnings primarily come from his rodeo career, including winnings, sponsorships, and endorsements.

Career Earnings

Steiner has had a successful career in professional rodeo, earning significant amounts in his competitions. In June 2023 alone, he earned over $25,000.

His biggest payday came from the Fort Worth Stock Show and Rodeo, where he won $27,080.

As of November 2023, he was on track to clear $500,000 in career earnings while still a teenager. Despite missing an entire month of action due to a knee injury, he managed to earn $31,967 in that year.

These earnings, combined with his winnings from other rodeos and his sponsorship deal with Bucked Up have contributed to his impressive career earnings.

Endorsements

Steiner has received sponsorships and endorsements from various brands and companies, such as Wrangler, Resistol, and Starforge Systems.

Personal Details

Girlfriend

Rocker Steiner is in a relationship with a woman named Kenna Squires. Kenna is also involved in the rodeo scene and is a barrel racer. The couple often shares pictures of their time together on social media. 

How Old is Rocker Steiner?

As of November 29, 2023, Rocker Steiner is 19 years old.

How tall is he?

He is 5’7″ tall.

What is his nationality?

He is American.

Career Highlights

  • Career earnings: $185,367
  • 2022 world standings place: 10th
  • 2022 Wrangler NFR standings place: 12th
  • 2022 Wrangler NFR earnings: $51,039
  • 2022 earnings: $185,367
  • Wrangler NFR Qualifications: 1 (2022)

FAQs About Rocker Steiner

What is his net worth?

Estimated $2 million as of 2023.

When did he start his rodeo career?

Steiner started his rodeo career at a young age, with his grandfather suggesting he try out a bucking horse when he was around nine years old.

Who are Rocker Steiner’s family members in rodeo?

Rocker Steiner’s grandfather, Bobby Steiner, is a world champion bull rider, and his father, Sid Steiner, won the Steer Wrestling World Champion title in 2002.
